data.why:
I work with an ERP system called PeopleSoft. The system provides
    their own development tools, but these are in many ways inefficient
    and inadequate. I've developed some perl modules that both augment
    PeopleSoft functionality (e.g. derive table-loading sequences from
    repository) and provide efficiencies (e.g. provide functions which
    do what otherwise require 10 minutes of interactive GUI work).
